bioconda.name: seqprep
bioconda.summary: Tool for stripping adaptors and/or merging paired reads with overlap into single reads.

biocontainers.name: seqprep
biocontainers.summary: Strips adapters and optionally merges overlapping paired-end (or paired-end contamination in mate-pair libraries) illumina style reads.

biotools.summary: Strips adapters and optionally merges overlapping paired-end (or paired-end contamination in mate-pair libraries) illumina style reads.

bioschemas.name: SeqPrep
bioschemas.summary: Strips adapters and optionally merges overlapping paired-end (or paired-end contamination in mate-pair libraries) illumina style reads.

galaxy.summary: Tool for merging paired-end Illumina reads and trimming adapters.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Strips adapters and optionally merges overlapping paired-end (or paired-end contamination in mate-pair libraries) illumina style reads.
